alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 11:46AM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches possible. * WHERE...In Idaho, Northern Clearwater Mountains and Southern Clearwater Mountains. In Montana, Lower Clark Fork Region and Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
